title: Apple Car: Mapping out the latest rumors and reports
content:
After puttering along and then sitting in neutral, rumors and reports of the mysterious Apple Car have kicked into high gear. Is the Apple Car on the fast track towards the finish line, or will it run out of gas? Get your motor running: we talk Apple Car in this episode of the Macworld Podcast.

This is episode 730 with Jason Cross, Michael Simon, and Roman Loyola.

Listen to episode 730
